text: is a former Japanese football player. ==Playing career== Honda was born in Saitama Prefecture on May 20, 1981. When he was a Senshu University student, he joined J2 League club Ventforet Kofu in 2003. On May 17, he debuted as substitute midfielder from the 88th minutes against Mito HollyHock.J.League On August 3, he played as substitute midfielder from the 85th minutes against Kawasaki Frontale.J.League However he could only play these 2 match and left the club end of 2003 season. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
